Rule.Name: Ensure MongoDB Software Version / Patches are Up to Date (Manual)
Rule.Section: Ensure MongoDB Software Version / Patches are Up to Date
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The MongoDB software version or patches are not up to date, which may expose the server to known vulnerabilities.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure the appropriate MongoDB software version/patches are installed. Command: 1. Backup the data set. 2. Download the binaries for the latest MongoDB revision from the MongoDB Download Page (https://www.mongodb.com/alerts) and store the binaries in a temporary location. 3. Shutdown the MongoDB instance. 4. Replace the existing MongoDB binaries with the downloaded binaries. 5. Restart the MongoDB instance.
